capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and I have to say, he seems like a pretty self-centered person. He always puts his own needs before others, which can be really frustrating at times. I'm not sure if that's just his personality or if there's something more going on, but it definitely makes interactions with him challenging.

You know, I've been thinking about Dudley's personality and it seems like he can be quite selfish at times. I mean, the fact that his personality is described as selfish really highlights that trait. It's interesting to consider how this might affect his relationships with others.
